title: Champion Rating Biased against Gank junglers
body:
So why are champion grades so biased against jungler's that gank more?

I see it way too much, e.g. This game:
74% kill participation, second least deaths in game, 10 KDA, second most gold, most wards placed - BUT - not amazing farm: No S rating.

Whereas the Shen got S- and Azir got S.

Riot need to implement something where rating for CS on those that have smite has a reduced impact.

replies.body: Yeah grading for sup and jgler have some issue. I think its due to they have quite unique roles to play and they can contribute to team doing various things which are hard to be measured fairly

It does have a reduced impact =/ your kda is actually 5-1-5 not 10 if you break it down, and your farm is only 104cs by 25mins which is kinda low. Thats more your 16-20min mark cs- i also notice in 26mins

not 1 dragon, rift herald or baron, which JG participation is important in....

So, your point is?
